synonyms: One Piece Movie 8: Episode of Alabasta - The Desert Princess and the Pirates
One Piece Película 8: La saga del Arabasta - Los piratas y la princesa del desierto

description:
A retelling of the Alabasta arc.

Revolution is brewing in the desert country of Alabasta, but the Straw Hats and Princess Vivi know the truth: it's all a plot cooked up by Crocodile.

(Source: Netflix)
